walkthrough.title: Astro Project Setup
walkthrough.description: Initialized Astro project with minimal template and configured global styles, fonts (Noto Sans JP, Fira Code), and theme toggle.

walkthrough.title: Component Implementation
walkthrough.description: Implemented BaseLayout, Header (with recursive navigation structure capability), Footer, Embed, and RecentPosts components.

walkthrough.title: Content System
walkthrough.description: Set up Content Collections for `docs`. Implemented dynamic routing with `src/pages/[...slug].astro` and index page.

walkthrough.title: Build Verification
walkthrough.description: Resolved build errors caused by incorrect relative import paths in dynamic route. Verified successful build.
